SEARCH
Package se.swedenconnect.signservice.authn.saml

Class AbstractSamlAuthenticationHandler

java.lang.Object
se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.AbstractSignServiceHandler
se.swedenconnect.signservice.authn.saml.AbstractSamlAuthenticationHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthenticationHandler, HttpResourceProvider, SignServiceHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultSamlAuthenticationHandler, SwedenConnectSamlAuthenticationHandler
public abstract class AbstractSamlAuthenticationHandler extends AbstractSignServiceHandler implements AuthenticationHandler, HttpResourceProvider
Abstract base class for SAML authentication handlers.

  • Method Details

    • authenticate

      @Nonnull public AuthenticationResultChoice authenticate(@Nonnull AuthnRequirements authnRequirements, @Nullable SignMessage signMessage, @Nonnull SignServiceContext context) throws UserAuthenticationException
      Initiates authentication of the user. Depending on the authentication scheme the return result object may contain the authentication result (assertion) or a request to direct the user to a remote service.

      It is the responsibility of authenticate, or resumeAuthentication, to assert that all requirements from the supplied AuthnRequirements are fulfilled. This means that the authentication must assert the supplied signer attributes (AuthnRequirements.getRequestedSignerAttributes()) and also check that the authentication is performed under an accepted authentication context (AuthnRequirements.getAuthnContextIdentifiers()).

      Specified by:
      authenticate in interface AuthenticationHandler
      Parameters:
      authnRequirements - the requested authentication requirements
      signMessage - the sign message (optional)
      context - the SignService context
      Returns:
      a choice object holding the authentication result or a HTTP request object (indicating that the user should be directed to an authentication service)
      Throws:
      UserAuthenticationException - for authentication errors

    • resumeAuthentication

      @Nonnull public AuthenticationResultChoice resumeAuthentication(@Nonnull HttpUserRequest httpRequest, @Nonnull SignServiceContext context) throws UserAuthenticationException
      Resumes an authentication process.
      Specified by:
      resumeAuthentication in interface AuthenticationHandler
      Parameters:
      httpRequest - the HTTP request received by the SignService frontend/application (containing authentication result from the remote authentication service)
      context - the SignService context
      Returns:
      a choice object holding the authentication result or a HTTP response action object (indicating that the user should be directed to an authentication service)
      Throws:
      UserAuthenticationException - for authentication errors

    • canProcess

      public boolean canProcess(@Nonnull HttpUserRequest httpRequest, @Nullable SignServiceContext context)
      A predicate that given a request tells whether this handler can process the request. This method must be invoked before AuthenticationHandler.resumeAuthentication(HttpUserRequest, SignServiceContext) is called.
      Specified by:
      canProcess in interface AuthenticationHandler
      Parameters:
      httpRequest - the HTTP request
      context - the SignService context (may be null depending on whether the invoking engine has set up a session or not)
      Returns:
      true if the handler can process the request and false otherwise

    • getResource

      public HttpBodyAction getResource(@Nonnull HttpUserRequest httpRequest) throws IOException
      Gets an HTTP resource. The resource is represented using a HttpBodyAction that holds the response body.
      Specified by:
      getResource in interface HttpResourceProvider
      Parameters:
      httpRequest - the HTTP user request received by the SignService frontend/application
      Returns:
      a HttpBodyAction
      Throws:
      IOException - for processing errors

    • supports

      public boolean supports(@Nonnull HttpUserRequest httpRequest)
      Given the request the method determines whether it can supply a resource (via HttpResourceProvider.getResource(HttpUserRequest).
      Specified by:
      supports in interface HttpResourceProvider
      Parameters:
      httpRequest - the HTTP user request received by the SignService frontend/application
      Returns:
      true if the handler can process the request and provide an HTTP resource and false otherwise

    • isSignMessageSupported

      protected boolean isSignMessageSupported()
      A predicate telling whether the concept of SignMessage is supported by the Identity Providers in the federation we are using. The default implementation always returns false.
      Returns:
      whether the SignMessage-concept is supported by the handler

    • isSignatureActivationProtocolSupported

      protected boolean isSignatureActivationProtocolSupported(@Nonnull org.opensaml.saml.saml2.metadata.EntityDescriptor idpMetadata)
      A predicate telling whether the Signature Activation Protocol is supported by the given IdP. The default implementation always returns false.

      See Signature Activation Protocol for Federated Signing.

      Parameters:
      idpMetadata - the IdP metadata
      Returns:
      whether the Signature Activation Protocol is supported

    • resetContext

      protected void resetContext(@Nonnull SignServiceContext context)
      Is invoked to reset the context, i.e., to remove elements that were added by this handler. If overridden, the super implementation should always be called.
      Parameters:
      context - the SignService context.

    • createAuthnRequestContext

      protected se.swedenconnect.opensaml.saml2.request.AuthnRequestGeneratorContext createAuthnRequestContext(@Nonnull AuthnRequirements authnRequirements, @Nullable SignMessage signMessage, @Nonnull SignServiceContext context, @Nonnull org.opensaml.saml.saml2.metadata.EntityDescriptor idpMetadata) throws UserAuthenticationException
      Creates an AuthnRequestGeneratorContext object that is to be used by the configured AuthnRequestGenerator.

      The default implementation provides a AuthnRequestGeneratorContext.getRequestedAuthnContextBuilderFunction() implementation that creates a RequestedAuthnContext element containing the authentication context URI:s that are declared in the AuthnRequirements and declared by the IdP in its metadata.

      Parameters:
      authnRequirements - the authentication requirements
      signMessage - the SignMessage
      context - the SignService context
      idpMetadata - the IdP metadata
      Returns:
      a AuthnRequestGeneratorContext object
      Throws:
      UserAuthenticationException - for errors creating the context

    • createResponseProcessingInput

      @Nonnull protected se.swedenconnect.opensaml.saml2.response.ResponseProcessingInput createResponseProcessingInput(@Nonnull org.opensaml.saml.saml2.core.AuthnRequest authnRequest, @Nullable String sentRelayState, @Nonnull HttpUserRequest httpRequest, @Nonnull SignServiceContext context)
      Creates a ResponseProcessingInput object based on the supplied parameters.
      Parameters:
      authnRequest - the AuthnRequest corresponding to the response
      sentRelayState - the RelayState that we sent along in the request (may be null)
      httpRequest - the HTTP request
      context - the SignService context
      Returns:
      a ResponseProcessingInput object

    • createValidationContext

      @Nullable protected org.opensaml.saml.common.assertion.ValidationContext createValidationContext(@Nonnull HttpUserRequest httpRequest, @Nonnull SignServiceContext context)
      An OpenSAML ValidationContext may optionally be supplied to the response processing methods.

      The default implementation returns null.

      Parameters:
      httpRequest - the HTTP request
      context - the SignService context.
      Returns:
      a ValidationContext or null

    • getIdpMetadata

      @Nonnull protected org.opensaml.saml.saml2.metadata.EntityDescriptor getIdpMetadata(@Nonnull AuthnRequirements authnRequirements, @Nonnull SignServiceContext context) throws UserAuthenticationException
      Finds the Identity Provider metadata from the federation given the authentication requirements.
      Parameters:
      authnRequirements - the authentication requirements
      context - the SignService context
      Returns:
      the IdP metadata entry
      Throws:
      UserAuthenticationException - if the IdP is not found

    • transformAttributes

      @Nonnull protected List<IdentityAttribute<?>> transformAttributes(@Nonnull List<org.opensaml.saml.saml2.core.Attribute> attributes) throws UserAuthenticationException
      Transforms SAML attributes into the generic SignService-representation of attributes.
      Parameters:
      attributes - the SAML attributes to transform
      Returns:
      a list of attributes in their generic representation
      Throws:
      UserAuthenticationException - if an unsupported attribute is encountered

    • assertAttributes

      protected void assertAttributes(@Nonnull AuthnRequirements authnRequirements, @Nonnull List<IdentityAttribute<?>> issuedAttributes, @Nonnull SignServiceContext context) throws UserAuthenticationException
      Asserts that all requested signer attributes (from the SignRequest) is provided among the attributes from the identity assertion received from the IdP.
      Parameters:
      authnRequirements - the authentication requirements (including the requested attributes)
      issuedAttributes - the attributes from the assertion
      context - the SignService context
      Throws:
      UserAuthenticationException - if requested attributes are not present in the issued attributes

    • assertAuthnContext

      protected void assertAuthnContext(@Nonnull org.opensaml.saml.saml2.core.AuthnRequest authnRequest, @Nullable String authnContextClassUri, @Nonnull SignServiceContext context) throws UserAuthenticationException
      Asserts that we received an authentication context class that we can accept.
      Parameters:
      authnRequest - the authentication request
      authnContextClassUri - the authn context that we received in the assertion
      context - the SignService context
      Throws:
      UserAuthenticationException - if we did not receive an acceptable context

    • assertSignMessage

      protected void assertSignMessage(@Nullable SignMessage signMessage, @Nonnull List<IdentityAttribute<?>> attributes, @Nonnull se.swedenconnect.opensaml.saml2.response.ResponseProcessingResult result, @Nonnull org.opensaml.saml.saml2.core.AuthnRequest authnRequest, @Nonnull SignServiceContext context) throws UserAuthenticationException
      Asserts the signature message.

      The default implementation does nothing.

      Parameters:
      signMessage - the sign message that was requsted (may be null)
      attributes - the received attributes
      result - the processing result
      authnRequest - the authentication request
      context - the SignService context
      Throws:
      UserAuthenticationException - for errors asserting the sign message

    • extendedAssertionVerification

      protected void extendedAssertionVerification(@Nonnull AuthnRequirements authnRequirements, @Nonnull org.opensaml.saml.saml2.core.AuthnRequest authnRequest, @Nonnull se.swedenconnect.opensaml.saml2.response.ResponseProcessingResult result, @Nonnull SignServiceContext context) throws UserAuthenticationException
      A method that enables subclasses to extend the verification of the received assertion. The default implementation does nothing.
      Parameters:
      authnRequirements - the authentication requirements
      authnRequest - the authentication request
      result - the result from the response processing (includes the assertion)
      context - the SignService context
      Throws:
      UserAuthenticationException - for verification errors

    • buildIdentityAssertion

      @Nonnull protected IdentityAssertion buildIdentityAssertion(@Nonnull se.swedenconnect.opensaml.saml2.response.ResponseProcessingResult result, @Nonnull List<IdentityAttribute<?>> attributes, @Nonnull SignServiceContext context) throws UserAuthenticationException
      Given a ResponseProcessingResult the method builds an IdentityAssertion object.
      Parameters:
      result - the result
      attributes - the identity attributes
      context - the SignService context
      Returns:
      an IdentityAssertion
      Throws:
      UserAuthenticationException - for errors during the transformation

    • wasSignMessageDisplayed

      protected boolean wasSignMessageDisplayed(@Nonnull se.swedenconnect.opensaml.saml2.response.ResponseProcessingResult result, @Nonnull List<IdentityAttribute<?>> attributes, @Nonnull org.opensaml.saml.saml2.core.AuthnRequest authnRequest, @Nonnull SignServiceContext context) throws UserAuthenticationException
      Given the ResponseProcessingResult and the AuthnRequest the method determines if the sign message was displayed. The default implementation of this method always returns false.
      Parameters:
      result - the processing result
      attributes - the received attributes (in generic format)
      authnRequest - the authentication request
      context - the SignService context
      Returns:
      a flag indicating whether the sign message was displayed or not
      Throws:
      UserAuthenticationException - for processing errors, i.e., the proof for a displayed sign message is illegal

    • storeAuthnRequest

      protected void storeAuthnRequest(@Nonnull org.opensaml.saml.saml2.core.AuthnRequest authnRequest, @Nonnull SignServiceContext context) throws UserAuthenticationException
      Stores a generated AuthnRequest message in the SignService context.
      Parameters:
      authnRequest - the object to store
      context - the context that we are storing the object in
      Throws:
      UserAuthenticationException - for storage errors

    • getAuthnRequest

      @Nullable protected org.opensaml.saml.saml2.core.AuthnRequest getAuthnRequest(@Nonnull SignServiceContext context) throws UserAuthenticationException
      Gets the stored AuthnRequest from the session context.
      Parameters:
      context - the context
      Returns:
      an AuthnRequest object or null if no message is stored
      Throws:
      UserAuthenticationException - for unmarshalling errors
